issue.title: C++: InternalMemoryPool::Free() should throw an error when there is insufficient allocated memory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-238](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-238). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, InternalMemoryPool allows any size of memory deallocation. This can cause potential errors.
